original_title: Большой капкан, или Соло для кошки при полной луне
overview: A large government official from Moscow, having come to rest at home, falls into a trap organized for him by two sisters working in the former state house. Sincerely falling in love with one of them, he does not suspect that he is becoming the object of blackmail ...
title: Big Trap, or solo for cat nnder full moon
